Home phone: (028) 38433517 ♦ Cell phone: 0989 024052 
Email: duc-nguyenvu@live.com 
PERSONAL DETAILS 
Nationality: Vietnamese 
Birth of date: January 12th, 1981 
Birth of place: Ho Chi Minh City 
Gender: Male 
OBJECTIVE 
To secure a position where I can effectively maximize my creativity and professional skills 
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY 
I master different types of writing, including copywriting, web content editing, news/article 
writing and technical writing. I have remarkable experience with other occupations - English 
teacher, team leader and pre-sales engineer.

LogiGear

Technical Writer 
•

•
Write release notes and release emails.  
•
Proofread proposals and articles in writing task force. 
•
Update and proofread functional design documents. 
•
Give names to UI elements/controls | Write messages used in software.      
Terralogic (formerly InfoNam) 
March 2014 – Dec 2017 
Senior Technical Writer 
•
Prepare, update, collect and organize case studies 
•
Proofread proposals, employee profiles, QA process documents, etc.

Work closely with HR and admin departments to prepare orientation, training 
materials and employee handbook | Design workflows.

Translate from English into Vietnamese and vice versa. 
DiCentral Co., Ltd 
July 2008 – March 2014 
Senior technical writer | leader of the technical writing & training division 
▪Plan and supervise activities of the technical writing & training division.  
▪Write and update installation manuals, user manuals, quick guides, troubleshooting 
guides, etc.  | Prepare training materials for new testers and developers.

institutes. 
▪Participate in holding internal events. 
▪Translate from English into Vietnamese and vice versa; among my translations are 
business agreements and ERP documents | Teach English grammar to the staff.  
▪Correct English wordings in software user interface.  
Accomplishments: set up a standard for all manuals | Build up a working team. 
DolSoft Co., Ltd 
June 2005 – Apr. 2006 
Documentation specialist (technical writer) 
▪Write and update user manuals, installation guides and other technical documents in 
Vietnamese and English. Edit, update and standardize materials prepared by other 
writers. 
▪Advise developers and testers on English usage. 
▪Translate from English into Vietnamese and vice versa. 
▪Design features, database and conceptual user interface for applications. 
▪As a project manager - manage 2 small projects. 
Power Transmission Company No. 4 
Dec. 2003 – May 2005 
(Công ty Truyền tải điện 4) 
IT technician

▪Maintain the computer systems at the company headquarters and power stations. 
▪Implement specialized applications provided by Electricity of Vietnam (EVN) | Train 
the staff on these applications. 
▪As the webmaster and editor of the company’s internal website – write news and 
articles; translate stories sourced from the Internet; edit news and articles 
contributed by other employees.

XPR Campaigns and Starfilm
